Weather wisdom

Heavy rain to hit region

There will be sunshine and warm temperatures this afternoon, but rain and cooler air will enter the region late tonight, meteorologist David Epstein writes.

Mass. police resume search for toddler

State police troopers, helicopters, divers, dogs, and detectives are searching for a third day for a 2-year-old girl who disappeared at a Rockport beach. (AP, 9:48 a.m.)

Riders will be able to buy and display tickets on smartphones, ideally making fare collections more efficient and reducing cash transactions. (Boston Globe)

For sale: 22-story high-rise near
Kendall Square. Prisoners not included.

The ad for the former Middlesex County courthouse boasts amenities, but there's one catch — the top four floors are the Middlesex Jail, filled with prisoners. (Globe)
